1.content:
After a not so long day at work Jack returns to his apartment placing his separation notice and other unemployment paperwork on his kitchen counter as he makes his way to his living room to lay down on the couch and let the events of the past hours sink in. Jack had just laid off from his job, maybe it was a good thing that his apartment lease was about to run out. Given he wouldn't have a place to stay but at least he wouldn't be tied to a lease that he didn't have the money to pay.

Suddenly he gets a text message from his friend Tony, "Hey man, wanna get a beer after work?" Jack then smiles, "Beer yes, but it's already after work for me." he replies, Tony then responds, "Oh no, what happened?" to which he responded, "Layoffs..." Tony then replied, "Okay how about beers at 6, on me?" Jack then laughs and replies, "Thanks man, see you then."
1.title: Services No Longer Required

11.content:
Later that day Jack goes to meet Tony at their favorite place, sort of a cool best kept secret type place in town.

Jack finds Tony sitting in their usual booth with a beer waiting on him, "Okay man, here's to Monday somehow getting worse, cheers." he says as the two begin drinking.

"So just like that, they let you go?" Tony asked, "Yea, i guess all the signs were there, i could tell that management had been tightening its belts recently, guess it was just a matter of time." he says taking another sip of his beer.

"Yea, so what are you going to do now?" Tony asks, "Well back to the job hunt i guess, but my lease is coming due and i don't have the money to commit to a reasonable lease." he says, "Oh wow man that sucks" Tony says, "Yea tell me about it, i mean i would ask to crash on your couch but i wouldn't want to cramp your style with Kim." Jack says smiling suggestively at his friend

But Tony just gives a faint smile, "Well if that's all your worried about then the couch is all yours." he says taking another sip of his beer

"Oh wow, i'm sorry man, when did all this happen?" he asks, "About a week, you know the whole it's not your it's me thing."

"Wow, i thought you two were a real match, i'd been expecting the best man conversation for about a month now." Jack said

"Thanks for the confidence man, but it just wasn't meant to be. I am going to miss having a woman's touch around my place. I mean i don't mean to make all men look bad but my place is a mess when its just me." he says laughing

"Hey no shame in it man, i'd be happy to clean houses if it would play my rent." Jack says, "Yea but you would look horrible in a maid outfit." Tony says as he bursts out laughing

Jack then begins laughing with him, "Yea you've got a point, hey did you ever get Kim in a maid or any other kind of outfit?" Jack asks

"Wouldn't you like to know... and Yes, yes i did." he says proudly, Jack then bursts out laughing, "Oh wow, you're the Man." he says, "Yep i try, nothing like having a girl around." Tony says wishing that he still had one.

Suddenly a mysterious woman approaches the table
11.title: At the bar

111.content:
Just then a mysterious woman approaches the table, she was confidently smiling like she owned the place and wore a long black jacket. She had to be in her mid 30s but she was carried herself like a college valedictorian with the world at her fingertips.

"Excuse me gentleman, i couldn't help but overhear your conversation." she says

"Oh i'm sorry if we were being too loud and i assure you when we were talking about girls in maid outfits we meant it in the most respectful way possible." Jack says nervously laughing

"Don't worry handsome, i understand, i mean if you've got it right, and who doesn't like to feel wanted." she says smiling

"Well thank you Miss, and we will keep it down, were not really as drunk as we appear." Tony says laughing

"Oh no you misunderstand, i'm here to help." she says smiling

"Ah help with what exactly?" Jack says looking at Tony as though they had somehow caught the attention of a prostitute.

"Well if you would be willing to join me at my private table i would be more then happy to explain." she says
111.title: A Polite Invitation

1111.content:
They both follow her to a booth in the back of the bar, the two of them sit on one side and she sits on the other.

"Okay now exactly which of our situations are you interested in helping us with?" Tony asks

"Right down to business, i like it." she says smiling, "And i am interested in giving you both what you want." she says smiling

"Wait, so your going to offer me a job and sleep with my friend?" Jack says

The woman then bursts out laughing, "Oh my thank you, i haven't laughed like that in years." she says, "And i guess you could say something like that, but i wouldn't be the one sleeping with him." she says

"Oh so you want to set me up with someone?" Tony asks, "Yes, you see i overheard that you are recently unemployed and in need of support until you find something else and you are recently single and in need of companionship, preferably one which cleans and wears fun outfits. Am i correct?"

"Well yea pretty much, and you believe you can help us with that?" Jack asks

"Yes, but i would really be acting more as a arbitrator as the two of you decide on details of the arrangement" she says smiling suggestively

The two then make eye contact as they rap their minds around what the mysterious stranger was proposing.

They both quickly broke eye contact and quickly jumped to correct any misconceptions the woman may have about them.

"Wow miss i know we seem close but we are definitely not that close!" Jack says, "Yea no way, i mean nothing wrong with guys doing stuff like that but were not like that." Tony says

The lady then bursts out laughing again, "Oh wow this has been a good night, i love talking covertly like this to see what conclusions people jump to," she says calming down from her own laughter.

"Now first off allow me to introduce myself, Madame Warren at your service, and you are?" she asks, "I'm Jack and he is Tony." he says

"A pleasure to meet you both, now Tony, i overheard that you recently parted ways with your girlfriend?" she asks, "Yes, about a week or so ago." he says, "Alright, and how much money would you say you spent on her?" she asks

Tony thinks for a moment and laughs to himself, "More then i'd like to admit," he says, "And Jack, you say you are in need of financial support until you find a new job?" she asks

"Yes?" Jack says not sure where she is going with this.

"Then it is simple, Jack will become Tony's live in girlfriend and receive financial support in exchange for whatever terms and services the two of you agree upon." she says as though it were an obvious conclusion

The two of them just stare at her silently for a moment before politely standing up and saying, "Well Miss Warren." she then interrupts to say, "Madame Warren"

"Ah yes Madame Warren, i'm guessing that we all needed a good laugh but i think we will be going now." Tony says
1111.title: A Strange Conversation

11111.content:
"Wait, i'm sorry i know it sounds like i am joking but i'm serious, here." she says unfolding a black letterhead piece of paper onto the table, "This is a magical contract that you will both write with your words." she says

They then look at her and say, "Okay? now lets say we believe that this is really a magical contract, are you the devil?" Jack says

She then smiles and says, "No, but you would be surprised how often i get that. I mean you just cant go around offering no strings attached magical solutions to peoples problems these days without someone thinking your after their soul." she says

"I assure you it is just plain and simple magic, as you will see if you choose to fill out the contract, i am an honest to goodness witch just looking to reintroduce magic back into our world one, or in this case two people, at a time. And i know you're wondering why not start with world hunger or a cure for cancer but the world simply isn't ready for that yet." she says

The two of them were both speechless, not sure what to make of all this. "Okay how about this, when you believe me, i will explain how magic works and why the world needs to take baby steps, deal?" she says

"Alright, as weird as this is." Tony says, "And not saying that were interested." Jack quickly says after gathering that her proposition would be turning him into a girl

"Of course, i offer this to far more people then those who accept it. So how about we you start by acknowledging the possibility that i am telling the truth." she says

"Okay, if this is for real you are suggesting that i turn into a girl, live with Tony as his girlfriend, and he takes care of my expenses until i find another job?" Jack says, "If that is what you want." she says

Suddenly the paper starts to glow and as the words appear in legal format and terminology, "Jackson Heart here by agrees to become woman and live as Anthony Lewis's girlfriend in exchange for full financial support until Mr. Heart finds a new job"

"Oh my god!" Tony says as Jack is still speechless, "Okay so needless to say we believe you a little more then we did a minute ago." Tony says

"Hey if this is real why can't we just wish for a new job for me and a girlfriend for him? Jack asks, as it sinks in that he could actually get turned into a girl

"Well not only would those requests involve a level of magic that i am currently unable to perform but even so it is not my kind of magic, my magic deals with contracts, Altering a consenting souls physical form is one thing, but making a random girl fall for you or getting another random person to give you a job is another, so for now this is what i am proposing." she says
11111.title: Magic is Real

111111.content:
"Okay i'm in." Tony says, Jack then quickly looks to Tony, "Wait what?!" he says, "Yea i mean as unbelievable as all this is, its worth a try right? but if you want total financial support then i think its fair to ask that you clean too." he says laughing

Suddenly the contract changes to include that Jack will keep Tony's home clean.

"Oh wow, so this is like a legally binding contract?" Tony asks, "Well magically binding, but yes." she says seeing that Tony is catching on to how it works

"Feel free to include any details you can think of, this is your negotiation." she says

"Hey are we really considering this, i mean you would know i'm a guy." Jack says, "Yea, but were not talking a sex change, if its magic you would be 100% woman, right?" Tony asks

"Yep that's right, 100% don't forget to use a condom, woman." she says looking at Jack

"NO SEX!" Jack quickly says, "I mean being a girl is one thing but if i were to even consider it he would have to keep that thing to himself." he says as she starts laughing and the contract amends itself

"Okay, but if i'm entering into a relationship where sex is off the table you better be some serious eye candy he says smiling

You open in and see mainly jeans but a few dresses too.
1111122111311211.title: Continue

choices: Jackie found a giggle bubbling up, as hysteria threatened...
Jackie's mind felt sluggish. A bimbo brain in an incredible body!
Jackson disapproved of such unflattering clothes on Jackie's body...
Jackie shrieked as reality dawned on her. The cries startling Lewis awake, too.
111112212.content:
Mumbling and moaning in his sleep. Jackson was worried about how he'd look when he woke. Or rather how she'd look, it was a mind-bender, for her. She didn't want to be too plain and simple. Not wanting to deal with the attention that'd come being overlooked.

At the same time, he was concerned that she couldn't be as pretty as she could manage. Her drink addled senses worked overtime to give Jackie Taylor Heart just the kind of body that Jackson would approve of.

Soft whimpers spilled from her lips, as her curves ripened beyond the contracted agreement. As Jackie went beyond Lewis' dream woman. Murmurring and mewling, Jackie's breasts grew from C-cup, racing past D... E.... F.... and settling at a shoulder straining G-cup. Such a blessed woman would need a counter balance for that bust. Jackson's jeans looked painted on. Even though her clothes adjusted to her expanded dimensions, she was lusher than a sober Jackie would like, even if a drunk Jackson was still fantasizing.

She squirmed in her seat, a plusher rump beneath her than she'd ever experienced before. Drowsing, she glimpsed Lewis through sleepy, heavy-lidded eyes. A smile spreading across her face, a vague recollection that things were all right now, settled into his mind.

It was only as Jackie struggled closer to proper consciousness, that the details sprang into focus. Along with the odd feelings coming from her body.

Her eyes snapped wide, taking it all in once everything fell into horrific place.

Erupting from the seat, she stood there taking in the new body.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c5/b0/59/...

The jeans and top were familiar, if tailored differently. But, she was deeply aware of her new bra. The thick strap around her chest... (bust, now?). Also the straps digging into her shoulders were a revelation too.
111112212.title: something else

choices: A floorboard creaked, and Lewis woke to take in Jackie too.
Closing her eyes, Jackie tried to wish away that immense rump...
Jackie tried to bury, and forget Jackson for cursing her with this body...
Overwhelmed, Jackie fainted, slumping unconscious to the floor.
11111222.content:
Head pounding, Jackson's dreams were troubled. He didn't want to break his word, Lewis had allowed him every one of his conditions. But, he still was afraid he'd be tempted to sleep with him.

As Jackson slept, he was transforming. Drawing from his subconscious mind, to dress and act as Jackson would choose to. Jackie was doomed to become a reluctant male fantasy... Her own self image defined by a residual male regret.

Not wanting to cripple his chances for getting a job. Jackson was happy for Jackie to be attractive.

Mewling in protest, she knew she'd have to tweak her look to please Lewis. She made it so that Jackie would be happy and comfortable wearing womens' clothes. Jackson wished for Jackie to be busty enough to please Lewis. But for herself, Jackson loved the idea of giving her a feature that would counter this.

Jackie was unaware of how this would affect her on waking. She just smiled softly to herself. Every piece of art, every attempt at perfection required her porcelain flaw. As Jackie drowsed she was unaware of the swelling of her ass. Far riper, far juicier, far too lush for anyone to bear.

She woke slowly, eyes blinking as the morning light streamed in through a gap in the curtains. Looking away from the blinding light, Jackie's eyes struggled to focus, their first view filled with her own cleavage.

She groaned softly to herself, remembering the deal. The price of a roof over her head. She was certain Lewis couldn't object to such a fantastic deep cleavage. She tried not to fantasise about getting a well-cushioned tit-wank. Now she'd be giving them instead. The image from Jackson's own wank-bank was too detailed as Jackie tried to dismiss it.

Her first time in a bikini was oddly normal. The freedom to dress as she chose, and be at ease in this body was coming back to haunt her.

It was only as she rose to her feet that she felt the width of her hips. Another groan, knowing this was part of the price. But, as she got to her feet. She found she was more than a little broader in the beam. She was blessed with an ass that belonged on a horse. The drowsy thoughts of a porcelain flaw had given her an ass that'd be impossible to ignore.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f8/5b/1a/...

The comfort she'd wanted for her new body, felt too much. Surely an ass that magnificent deserved some type of reaction. Jackie certainly hated the drunk Jackson with a cold furious passion.
11111222.title: Jackie's troubled dreams...

choices: Lewis lists off a few ideas she could follow to find a job...
"If you prefer... house-wife, or home-maker..." Lewis added.
"Life guard, or fitness Instructor." Lewis pulled from thin air...
Jackie found a natural submissiveness coming towards Lewis...
111112221.content:
Planting her hands on her hips. Jackie squared off against Lewis. The canary yellow bikini rather undercut her outrage.

"And how... am I meant to be taken seriously in a business deal with a body like this!?" Jackie said with quiet fury.

"Well..." Lewis didn't get any further.

"I mean I'm a salesman, I need to be taken seriously."

"Enough." Lewis barked, startling Jackie into stunned silence. Feeling intimidated and slightly horny, she let Lewis speak.

"You were a salesman." he growled, "And you weren't good at it." he explained.

Jackie could only stare at the floor by her feet. It was hard to accept, but from her new perspective it was a hard conclusion to refuse. She could only nod her agreement, sucking in the sobs. She hoped Lewis didn't hear her crushing defeat, or seeing the tears forming in the corners of her eyes. It felt like her entire world had collapsed, and then jumped up and down on her shattered remains.

"If you'd been good, you wouldn't have lost your job, and needed a favour from me..." his rage more profound than Jackie's.

"Think of it as an opportunity to change careers."

Jackie timidly nodded her head, she didn't like to admit failure. But Jackson's failure was total. She tried to draw a line under it, and move on.
111112221.title: A floorboard creaked, and Lewis woke to take in...

info.brief_description: After losing his job Jack makes a deal with his recently single friend
info.description:
Hey everyone, I know its been a while but i'm back and ready with a new story which i will be working on personally. Now i'm going to spare you the long detailed intro for now so i can go ahead and get this thing started. But here is enough to get all my fellow gender bender fans interested.

Our main character Jack just lost his job so with the fear of impending financial difficulties in his future, along with Tony, his recently single friend and an oddly convenient magic spell/potion he will make a deal with his friend where in exchange for a place to live, food, and gas money he will turn into Jackie, Tony's live in girlfriend with terms and benefits under negotiation until he can find a new job.

Now i plan on releasing new chapters on a fairly regular basis during the week, but it is subject to change depending on time and inspiration.

Enjoy :)
